SELECT RANK() OVER(ORDER BY WIN DESC) playerRank, NAME, NICKNAME, TEAM_ID, WIN+LOSE match, WIN, LOSE, WIN/NULLIF((WIN+LOSE),0) * 100 winrate, KILL, DEATH, ASSIST, FUNC_PLAYERKDA(NICKNAME) kda FROM PLAYER
WHERE ${searchCondition} like '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'

SELECT P.TEAM_ID teamId, P.PLAYER_ID, P.NAME name, T.NAME teamname, P.NICKNAME nickname, P.WIN WIN, P.LOSE lose, P.KILL kill, P.DEATH death, P.ASSIST assist, FUNC_PLAYERKDA(NICKNAME) kda FROM PLAYER P JOIN TEAM T ON P.TEAM_ID = T.TEAM_ID WHERE P.NICKNAME = #{nickname}
